name: Gelatinous Cube!!
description:
supports xbox controller, left stick move, right stick look,. (apparently the button input is a bit funky in WebGL so jumping is disabled for controller. still works on keyboard)

keyboard: SWAD movement, arrow look. space jump

You are the gelatinous cube! You need to eat all the villagers! Good luck!

This game was created to dip my toes into 3d. I traditionally develop in 2d. Just wanted to make a simple game that takes advantage of controller input.
